title: PublicationSampleCounts
description: PublicationSampleCounts contains the count data for publication content, used for the Progenetix publications collection.

ccgh.description: The number of samples reported in this publication analyzed by chromosomal Comparative Genomic Hybridization (CGH)

acgh.description: The number of samples reported in this publication analyzed by any type of genomic hybridization array

wes.description: The number of samples reported in this publication analyzed by whole exome sequencing (WES)

wgs.description: The number of samples reported in this publication analyzed by whole genome sequencing (WGS)

ngs.description: The number of samples reported in this publication analyzed by any of WGS and/or WES. The number is at least the maximum of wes and wgs.

genomes.description: The number of samples reported in this publication analyzed. The number is at least the maximum of ccgh, acgh, wes, wgs.

progenetix.description: The number of samples from this publication in the Progenetix biosamples collection
